translations: n．有抱负的人，有志者：有追求某种目标或职位的强烈愿望的人。
· Many aspirants are competing for the same job.
许多有抱负的人竞争同一份工作。

sentences.sentence: There are many kinds of spiritual aspirants.
sentences.translation: 有很多种类型的灵性追求者。

sentences.sentence: "Aspirants, a way." Only a firm faith to win the brilliant achievements!
sentences.translation: “有志者，事竟成。”只有拥有坚定的信念，才能获得辉煌的成就！

sentences.sentence: But it will be a boon to future aspirants if it forces America to deal with its broken primary system.
sentences.translation: 可在未来野心家眼里，迫使美国应付支离破碎的初选机制，只会给自己带来好处。
